name: The Only One (FlerBaDer)
description:
A short platformer game made for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam using the Unity Engine in under 48 hours with only 2 Days prior of experience


In this platformer you play as a lone duck and traverse a dangerous landscape full of gooey monsters, that will kill you in only one hit, only to discover the truth about what happened to his fellow ducks.
